name: Libgcrypt-py
short_description: libgcrypt-py is a Python wrapper around the libgcrypt cryptographic library. It supports functionality/algorithms that are supported by libgcrypt, including Symetric Ciphers (3DES, AES, Twofish, Blowfish), Cryptographic Hashing (MD5, SHA1, RIPE-MD160), P
